00037 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_RPC
00038 
00039 #include <obd_support.h>
00040 #include <obd_class.h>
00041 #include <lustre_lib.h>
00042 #include <lustre_ha.h>
00043 #include <lustre_import.h>
00044 
00045 #include "ptlrpc_internal.h"
00046 
00047 
00048 void ptlrpc_fill_bulk_md(lnet_md_t *md, struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc,
00049                          int mdidx)
00050 {
00051         CLASSERT(PTLRPC_MAX_BRW_PAGES < LI_POISON);
00052 
00053         LASSERT(mdidx < desc->bd_md_max_brw);
00054         LASSERT(desc->bd_iov_count <= PTLRPC_MAX_BRW_PAGES);
00055         LASSERT(!(md->options & (LNET_MD_IOVEC | LNET_MD_KIOV |
00056                                  LNET_MD_PHYS)));
00057 
00058         md->length = max(0, desc->bd_iov_count - mdidx * LNET_MAX_IOV);
00059         md->length = min_t(unsigned int, LNET_MAX_IOV, md->length);
00060 
00061         if (ptlrpc_is_bulk_desc_kiov(desc->bd_type)) {
00062                 md->options |= LNET_MD_KIOV;
00063                 if (GET_ENC_KIOV(desc))
00064                         md->start = &BD_GET_ENC_KIOV(desc, mdidx *
00065                                                      LNET_MAX_IOV);
00066                 else
00067                         md->start = &BD_GET_KIOV(desc, mdidx * LNET_MAX_IOV);
00068         } else if (ptlrpc_is_bulk_desc_kvec(desc->bd_type)) {
00069                 md->options |= LNET_MD_IOVEC;
00070                 if (GET_ENC_KVEC(desc))
00071                         md->start = &BD_GET_ENC_KVEC(desc, mdidx *
00072                                                       LNET_MAX_IOV);
00073                 else
00074                         md->start = &BD_GET_KVEC(desc, mdidx * LNET_MAX_IOV);
00075         }
00076 }
00077
